circle_detection
====================

.. rst-class:: lead

   |summary|

----

This is the documentation for version |current| of the |product| package.

Get started
-----------

#. Install the package:

   .. literalinclude:: how-to/install/includes/install.sh
      :language: sh

For most operating systems we provide package binaries via pip. If no binaries are available and the package has to be
built from source, `OpenMP <https://www.openmp.org/>`__ must be installed.

Upgrade
-------

If you want to upgrade to version |current| of the package, see :doc:`changelog/index`.
